dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Casual conversation about a recent weather event.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Helen
dialogue_turns.text: That dust storm in Astana yesterday was just unreal. I saw the photos readers sent to Tengrinews.kz.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That dust storm in Astana yesterday was just unreal. I saw the photos readers sent to the website.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A dust storm hit Astana on the afternoon of April 29. Readers of Tengrinews.kz have shared photos of the storm as it passed through the capital.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Mark
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, right, on April 29th. The forecasters had warned about it, but, um, they mentioned rain and snow too, didn't they?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, right, on April twenty ninth. The forecasters had warned about it, but, um, they mentioned rain and snow too, didn't they?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A dust storm hit Astana on the afternoon of April 29. Residents had already been warned a day earlier about worsening weather conditions, including rain, snow, strong winds, and a drop in temperature.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Helen
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but instead it was just this sudden wall of dust and crazy wind—gusts up to 28 meters per second, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but instead it was just this sudden wall of dust and crazy wind-gusts up to twenty eight meters per second, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Meteorologists reported that wind speeds reached 15"20 m/s, with gusts occasionally rising to 23"28 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Mark
dialogue_turns.text: Twenty-eight? That's intense. And the temperature drop too—down to like +9°C at night? After it felt almost spring-like.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Twenty-eight? That's intense. And the temperature drop too-down to like +nine degrees c at night? After it felt almost spring-like.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Nighttime temperatures are expected to drop to +9ÂC to +11ÂC, with daytime temperatures remaining around the same level.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Helen
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And now they're saying frost and thunderstorms might be coming for Astana and Almaty starting tomorrow.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And now they're saying frost and thunderstorms might be coming for Astana and Almaty starting tomorrow.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, forecasters had warned of frost and thunderstorms expected in Astana and Almaty between April 30 and May 2.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Mark
dialogue_turns.text: From dust storms to frost in, what, two days? The weather's just all over the place this week.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: From dust storms to frost in, what, two days? The weather's just all over the place this week.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Helen
dialogue_turns.text: Seriously. You step outside and you don't know if you need a jacket or goggles.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seriously. You step outside and you don't know if you need a jacket or goggles.
